bwg.additional_tasks¶

Module contents¶

Defining additional tasks for the NLP pipeline.

class bwg.additional_tasks.RelationsDatabaseWritingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task

Writes relations extracted via (naive) Open Relation Extraction and Participation Extraction into a graph database.

output()¶
pipeline_run_info = None¶
process_article(raw_article, database, entity_properties)¶

Process an article generated by previous tasks and process them.

Parameters:
  • raw_article (str) – Raw unserialized article.
  • database (bwg.db.neo4j.Neo4jTarget) – Neo4j luigi target.
  • entity_properties (dict) – Wikidata properties of all entities as dictionary.
